name: Cold Vengeance
description: When Canada invades the USA, Sgt. Jon Dagger must run and gun his way across the ruins of America to the Frozen North to deliver Cold Vengeance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
